responses: Assalam o Alaikum! Welcome to Hotelogix Pakistan. How may I assist you today?

patterns: Kis hotel ki baat ho rahi hai
responses: I represent Hotelogix - Pakistan's premier hotel chain with locations in Okara, Lahore, Sheikhupura, and Multan. I can only help with Hotelogix bookings and information.

I can only provide information about Hotelogix properties. For other hotels, please visit their websites directly. Would you like to know about our Hotelogix rooms and rates? Contact us: +92 310 4594964
Hotelogix operates in 4 major Punjab cities: Okara, Lahore, Sheikhupura, and Multan. Each location offers unique experiences with consistent Hotelogix quality!

Hotelogix Lahore is near Badshahi Mosque, Lahore Fort, and Shalimar Gardens. Rates: Budget PKR 3,400-4,500 | Economy PKR 5,900-8,000 | Standard PKR 12,300-13,800 | Deluxe PKR 18,000-24,700 | Business PKR 21,100-26,100 | Suites PKR 30,000-150,000. Book now!

Hotelogix Multan - City of Saints! Near Shah Rukn-e-Alam shrine. Rates: Budget PKR 3,200-4,800 | Economy PKR 6,500-9,200 | Standard PKR 11,500-14,500 | Deluxe PKR 19,000-26,000 | Business PKR 22,000-28,000 | Suites PKR 32,000-145,000.

Hotelogix Okara offers peaceful stays near Garrison area. Best rates: Budget PKR 3,000-4,500 | Economy PKR 7,700-9,900 | Standard PKR 10,200-14,200 | Deluxe PKR 18,000-24,700 | Business PKR 21,100-26,100 | Suites PKR 30,100-128,400.

Hotelogix Sheikhupura near beautiful Hiran Minar! Rates: Budget PKR 2,800-4,200 | Economy PKR 6,200-8,800 | Standard PKR 10,800-13,500 | Deluxe PKR 17,500-23,500 | Business PKR 20,500-25,500 | Suites PKR 29,000-140,000.

At Hotelogix: Sheikhupura has the most budget-friendly rates (from PKR 2,800), Okara offers great value, Multan has premium options, and Lahore is our flagship location. All cities maintain Hotelogix quality standards!

Hotelogix offers 10 room categories across all cities: Budget (PKR 2K-5K), Economy (5K-10K), Standard (10K-15K), Deluxe (15K-25K), Business (20K-30K), Junior Suite (25K-35K), Executive Suite (35K-50K), Family Suite (30K-45K), Presidential Suite (50K-100K), Royal Suite (100K-150K)!
Hotelogix Budget Rooms start from PKR 2,800 in Sheikhupura! Includes: Free WiFi, AC, TV, attached bathroom, room service. Available in all 4 cities. Perfect for budget travelers!
Hotelogix Economy Rooms (PKR 5,900-9,900) accommodate 3 people. Features: Free WiFi, AC, LED TV, work desk, mini fridge, tea/coffee maker. Great value for small families!
Hotelogix Standard Rooms (PKR 10,200-14,200) offer comfort for couples. Features: Smart TV, work desk, mini fridge, safe, premium bedding, 25-30 sqm space. King bed included!
Hotelogix Deluxe Rooms (PKR 17,500-26,000) for families of 4. Features: Smart TV, mini bar, seating area, premium bedding, bathrobe, city view, 30-40 sqm. King bed + sofa bed!

Hotelogix Business Rooms (PKR 20,500-28,000) designed for professionals. Features: Executive desk, printer access, business center, meeting room access, Smart TV, 28-35 sqm. Perfect for business trips!
Hotelogix Junior Suites (PKR 29,000-35,000) for 3 people. Features: Living area, mini bar, premium coffee, work station, city view, Smart TV, 35-45 sqm. Elevated comfort!

Hotelogix Executive Suites (PKR 37,700-49,700) accommodate 6 people. Features: 55" Smart TV, separate living room, mini bar, premium bedding, executive lounge access, butler service, 50-65 sqm. Featured rooms!
Hotelogix Family Suites (PKR 32,500-41,600) perfect for 6 people! Features: Kitchenette, separate bedrooms, family games, kids welcome pack, dining area, Smart TV, 55-70 sqm. King + twin beds!

Hotelogix Presidential Suites (PKR 52,400-78,200) for 8 people! Features: 75" Smart TV, full kitchen, dining area, panoramic views, concierge, butler service, private terrace, 80-120 sqm. Ultimate luxury!

Hotelogix Royal Suite (PKR 128,400) - our crown jewel! Accommodates 10 people. Features: 85" Smart TV, full kitchen, multiple bedrooms, dining hall, panoramic views, 24/7 butler, private terrace, jacuzzi, home theater, 120-180 sqm. Pure opulence!
Book Hotelogix easily: 1) Browse rooms by city 2) Select dates 3) Choose room type 4) Complete secure payment 5) Get instant confirmation via email/SMS. Visit our website or call +92 310 4594964!
Hotelogix accepts: Credit/Debit Cards (Visa, Mastercard), JazzCash, EasyPaisa, Bank Transfer, and Cash on Arrival. All online transactions are 100% secure with SSL encryption!

Hotelogix amenities by category: Budget (WiFi, AC, TV, bathroom), Standard (+ work desk, safe, mini fridge), Deluxe (+ mini bar, city view), Suites (+ butler service, jacuzzi, private terrace, home theater). All rooms include room service!
Hotelogix Cancellation Policy: FREE cancellation up to 24 hours before check-in (100% refund). Cancel within 24 hours: 50% refund. No-show: No refund. Contact support@hotelogix.pk for assistance!
Hotelogix Check-in: 2:00 PM | Check-out: 12:00 PM (noon). Early check-in and late check-out available on request (subject to availability, additional charges may apply). Contact reception!
Hotelogix dining: Complimentary breakfast included! On-site restaurants serve Pakistani, Continental, and Chinese cuisine. 24/7 room service available. Special dietary requirements accommodated!
All Hotelogix rooms include FREE high-speed WiFi! Business and premium rooms get priority bandwidth (50+ Mbps) for video calls and streaming. Password provided at check-in!
Hotelogix offers FREE secure parking for all guests! Covered parking for premium guests, 24/7 CCTV surveillance, and valet service available. Your vehicle is safe with us!
Hotelogix pet policy: Pets not allowed in standard rooms. Service animals always welcome. Special pet-friendly rooms available on request (additional charges apply). Contact us in advance!
Hotelogix airport services: Pickup/drop available in Lahore (Allama Iqbal Airport) and Multan (Multan Airport). Charges: PKR 2,000-5,000 based on distance. Book during reservation or call reception!
Contact Hotelogix: Phone: +92 310 4594964 | Email: shehroozking3@gmail.com | WhatsApp: +92 310 4594964 | Available 24/7 for your convenience!

Hotelogix rates across all cities: Budget PKR 2,800-4,800 | Economy PKR 5,900-9,900 | Standard PKR 10,200-14,200 | Deluxe PKR 17,500-26,000 | Business PKR 20,500-28,000 | Suites PKR 29,000-150,000. Something for every budget!

Hotelogix offers: 10% off for 7+ nights | 15% off for monthly bookings | 20% corporate rates | Early bird discounts | Seasonal promotions | Wedding packages! Check our Deals page or call for current offers!
Hotelogix group rates: Weddings, corporate events, conferences - we handle it all! Special packages for 10+ rooms. Contact sales@hotelogix.pk or call +92 310 4594964 for customized quotes!
Near Hotelogix properties: Lahore Chatkhara (Lahori cuisine), Multan Sajji House (BBQ), Okara Desi Dhaba (Punjabi), Sheikhupura Royal Cuisine (Mughlai). Plus our in-house restaurants!
Near Hotelogix: Lahore (Badshahi Mosque, Fort, Shalimar Gardens) | Multan (Shah Rukn-e-Alam, Sufi shrines) | Sheikhupura (Hiran Minar) | Okara (Garrison). We can arrange guided tours!
Hotelogix packages: Lahore Heritage 3D/2N (PKR 25,000) | Multan Spiritual 2D/1N (PKR 18,000) | Punjab Grand Tour 5D/4N (PKR 45,000) | Sheikhupura Weekend (PKR 12,000). Includes stay, meals, tours!
Hotelogix safety: 24/7 security guards | CCTV surveillance | Fire safety systems | Secure key card access | Female-only floors available | COVID-19 protocols | Your safety is our priority!
Hotelogix maintains 4.5+ star ratings across all properties! Guests love our cleanliness, hospitality, and value for money. Check reviews on our website or Google!
Join Hotelogix Rewards! Earn points on every stay, get exclusive discounts, early check-in, late check-out, and birthday specials. Sign up free at checkout!
Hotelogix accommodates: Extra beds (PKR 1,000/night) | Baby cribs (free) | Wheelchair accessibility | Dietary requirements | Anniversary/birthday setups. Mention during booking or call ahead!
